step.para: On the Project details page, choose Use a template (Recommended).
In Project name, enter the name that you want to assign to your project and its associated resource names. The name must be unique in your account.
In Project ID, use the default keyword to assign to your project path and resource names, or choose a different keyword. Choose an ID that is unique in your account.
In Template type, choose the application type that you want to create a project for, such as Web application. For the list of available template types, see LINK.
In Programming language, choose the programming language that you want to create a project for, such as Javascript. For the list of available template types, see LINK.
Choose the template you want to use, and then choose Create project.
